name: Tank Operators
description:
A local co-op game inside a tank. The game is a modern take on Tank from Pegasus and elements from Sea of Thieves. Tried to achieve similar vibes to SoT but had a few design issues. In the game you need to survive 3 waves with increasing amount of enemies.

Gameplay consists of 2 players controlling the tank, there are 2 seats one is for driving the other is for controlling the turret. Apart from that, there are 2 service areas where you can pick up ammo or repair kit, you can place ammo inside an ammo slot in the middle of the tank, with the ammo placed in you can shoot it towards the enemy tanks, you can also use the repair kit to repair the tank sides.

Your tank can receive damage from enemy tanks, while a side gets below 20% HP a penalty is applied, when tracks get damaged, you won't be able to drive, damaged front disabled turret control, damaged back disabled the ability to pick up ammo and repair kit.
